alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Leavenworth (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 7:05PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Leavenworth, southeastern Atchison and central Platte Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 705 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Easton, or 10 miles south of Atchison, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Leavenworth, Lansing, Platte City, Weston, Easton, Tracy, Fairmount, Farley, Iatan, Fort Leavenworth, Stillings, Bean Lake, Beverly, East Leavenworth, Lowemont, Jarbalo and Potter. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 20 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
